welcome_message_body: Welcome to Shawnee, where small-town charm meets big-city amenities. Known for its rich history, friendly community, and beautiful outdoor spaces, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Johnson Executive Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Johnson Executive Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by various airlines.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is the main hub for all domestic and international flights at Lawrence Airport.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight shipments at Lawrence Airport.
